{error}

Possible causes:
â€¢ File in use by other programs
â€¢ No write permission
â€¢ Target path not exist

â€¢ Run as administrator

help.title: Save Converter Help
help.content:
ğŸ¯ Principle:
Modify Steam ID in save file to use other players' saves on your account.

ğŸ“‹ Steps:
1. Select .sl2 save file;      2. Enter your 17-digit Steam ID
3. Click convert, choose save location; 4. Copy converted file to game save folder

ğŸ” How to get Steam ID:
â€¢ Steam profile URL:
   https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198378589834/
   76561198368389836 is the Steam ID

â€¢ Local save folder:
   C:\Users\username\AppData\Roaming\Nightreign\76521198568389835
   Folder name is Steam ID, click ğŸ“ to open save folder

âš ï¸ Important:
â€¢ Backup original save, conversion is irreversible
â€¢ Supports .sl2, .co2 files, test save loading first

ğŸ’¡ Technical:
AES-CBC decryption to replace Steam ID and recalculate checksum for integrity.
